summary:
This mod allows you to kiss your spouse. Just a simple kiss (two scenes), no adult content.
Completely lore-friendly.

Works without FNIS or SKSE
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-1-1419037684.jpg[/img]

Here, I could tell about you the reasons behind this mod, how immersive it would be to kiss your spouse, how many "Kiss Mod requests" I've seen while working on[i] "Marriage Dynamic Outfits"[/i]... But do I really have to? Everyone knows things are bad.

This mod allows you to kiss your spouse. Just a simple kiss (two scenes).
No adult content, no strapons, nothing. 
Completely lore-friendly.

Demonstration ([u]reduce a volume[/u] before watching, there is a noise at the beginning):
[youtube]5TWIE0nxlTw[/youtube]

Version 0.5:
[youtube]cPkjQhunpRs[/youtube]

Side Reviews:
[youtube]VhKhecSdCpc[/youtube]

[youtube]kZvwu4wLbdc[/youtube]

Technically, this is an animation mod that works without adding any extra animations to the game. Instead, kissing scene is powered by the physics engine. It's just two ragdolls in slow-time with HAVOK-restrictions. Nothing fancy.

I know there are several animation-based kiss mods (most of them use FNIS or SKSE to work properly). This mod is different, because everything is calculated on the fly, you will never get the same scene twice, every kiss is unique.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-2-1419037684.jpg[/img]

Technical simplicity makes this mod compatible with almost everything (including custom races, race skeletons and followers) and provides NO extra requirements.

That means - no, you don't have to spend hours to install/configurate FNIS, animation packs, race combatibily patches if you don't want. This mod is completely FNIS/SKSE free (but it will also work fine on the FNIS/SKSE system)!

All you need is [b]Skyrim 1.9[/b]

So far, works fine with almost any body-type. Fully compatible with HDT physics extensions. Should work with all the NPC races. Technically you can kiss any creature that can go ragdoll, including animals (not tested much).

The only exception are Children. Kissing a child is deliberately prohibited by the internal conditions.

[u]Note: [/u]You can still gain the vanilla[i] Lover's Comfort.[/i] This mod doesn't change anything in the vanilla spell.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-3-1419037684.jpg[/img]

Activate the [b][u]Lover Stone [/u][/b]to receive the ability (no need to accept the sign, you can just press Cancel)

[u][b]Can't find the Stone? Or maybe it doesn't work in your case?
[/b][/u]Use the console workaround to get the perk: 

Open the console and type:
help "LoversComfortRagdoll" 
*You will see the ID* 
player.addperk ID


[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-4-1419037684.jpg[/img]

To make characters undress - [u]unequip [/u]everything from your right hand
To keep characters dressed up - [u]equip [/u]something to your right hand
If any item is equipped in the[u] left hand[/u] - spines will be connected too for better balance 

Aproach your spouse (you need to stay very close to the spouse, closer than you usually talk) and activate him / her. Then use the "Kiss" option.
Player can't kiss characters that are sitting or using furniture

Deviation tracking: The mod is monitoring the kissing scene, it will try to prolong the good scenes and terminate the bad ones (based on the characters position and angle)

[b]Can I remove the fadeout?
[/b]
Yes. Type in the console:
[i]Player.SetAV WaitingForPlayer 99[/i]

Type to restore the default mode:
[i]Player.SetAV WaitingForPlayer 0[/i]

The purpose of fadeout is to hide non-immersive technical events and preparations

[b]Can I control the camera?[/b]
No, but you can use the vanilla free camera mode to make closer shots of the second scene, type TFC in the console right after the first fadeout screen. If you try to use TFC during the first scene, the time will reset and unfortunately both characters will fall

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-5-1419037684.jpg[/img]

After each kiss you will recieve a Kiss Effect: [b]carring capacity bonus [/b]+[b] faster stamina regeneration[/b]. The bonus will be removed in the first fight after the kiss. There is no time limit, the bonus will be active as long as you avoid any battles (sneaking will do the job if you ask).


[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-1-1419037696.jpg[/img]

[b][u]Have no spouse to kiss?[/u][/b]
- Open the console
- Click on the character you want to kiss
- Type: [b]SetRelationshipRank player 4[/b]

If someone will make a romance mod that modifies the relationship rank (I don't know, maybe someone already did?), mods will be compatible.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60903-2-1419037696.jpg[/img]

Yes, this mod is not perfect and [u]never will be[/u]. Please, expect that 10% of the scenes will look broken.

To enhance your experience with this plugin, make sure you have a healthy overall script latency or/and stable savegame size. Script lags or extreme ENB settings can interfere with the quality of the scenes (delays will cause incorrect timing). Several problems gone instantly during beta-test when user simply removed few scripted mods.

[b]Known issues:[/b]
If you [u]unable to talk [/u]with the person after the kiss, first, wait few seconds
If the problem is not going away, try the following workaround:
- type in console [b]"PushActorAway IDthatYouSeeByClickingOnNPCfromTheConsole 0"[/b]
- The actor should fall
- Activate and [u][b]kiss[/b] [/u]the spouse second time, while he/she is lying on the floor
- After that, the spouse will talk again

[b]Compatibility issues:[/b]
- [i]"Dovahkriid - The Dragon Lords" [/i]can possibly trigger the non-speak issue on Jordiss The Sword-Maiden after the kiss (2 different game configurations confirmed, BUT it may be a latency issue). 
[i]- "Enhanced Blood Textures"[/i] can sometimes cause [u]bleeding [/u]after the kiss

Special thanks to the most active beta-tester: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/7925943-scorpionsk/]ScorpionSK[/url]

If you like this one, please, check [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/875705/?tb=mods&pUp=1]my other mods[/url]
author: flexcreator
